tossup_question: -   –   Which of the following diseases is caused by a virus?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Acne
X) Shingles
Y) Impetigo
Z) Necrotizing fasciitis [fash-ee-eye-tis]
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following compounds would one use to detect the presence of DNA in an agarose gel?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Ethidium bromide [eth-ih-dee-um broh-myde]
X) Coomassie Blue [coo-mah-see]
Y) Rhodamine 2 [row-duh-meen]
Z) Fluorescein [flow-ruh-seen]
